Ingredients:
2 oz Aged Rum
1 oz Fresh Lime Juice
1/2 oz Orange Curacao
1/4 oz Orgeat Syrup
1/4 oz Simple Syrup
Mint sprig for garnish
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with mint sprig.

Ingredients:
2 oz Light Rum
1 oz Fresh Lime Juice
3/4 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into chilled coupe glass.

Ingredients:
2 oz Light Rum
1 oz Fresh Lime Juice
3/4 oz Simple Syrup
8 Fresh Mint Leaves
Club Soda
Instructions: Muddle mint with simple syrup and lime juice. Add rum and ice. Top with club soda. Stir gently.

Ingredients:
2 oz Dark Rum
4 oz Ginger Beer
1/2 oz Fresh Lime Juice
Instructions: Build in glass over ice. Stir gently.

Ingredients:
2 oz Dark Jamaican Rum
2 oz Pineapple Juice
1 oz Fresh Lime Juice
1/2 oz Simple Syrup
Dash of Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass filled with ice.

Ingredients:
2 oz Light Rum
2 oz Pineapple Juice
1.5 oz Coconut Cream
1/2 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Blend all ingredients with ice until smooth.

Ingredients:
1.5 oz Gold Rum
1.5 oz Dark Jamaican Rum
1 oz 151-Proof Rum
1 oz Fresh Lime Juice
1/2 oz Falernum
1/2 oz Grenadine
1 tsp Passion Fruit Syrup
Dash of Angostura Bitters
Instructions: Shake all ingredients except 151 rum. Pour into glass. Float 151 rum on top.

Ingredients:
1.5 oz Gold Rum
1.5 oz Pineapple Juice
1.5 oz Orange Juice
1 oz Lime Juice
1/2 oz Grenadine
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass filled with ice.

Ingredients:
2 oz Aged Rum
1/2 oz Simple Syrup
1/4 oz Fresh Lime Juice
Instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Serve over fresh ice.

Ingredients:
2 oz Light Rum
2 oz Gold Rum
1 oz Orange Curacao
2 oz Orange Juice
2 oz Pineapple Juice
1.5 oz Lemon Juice
1/2 oz Orgeat Syrup
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Pour into scorpion bowl with ice.

Ingredients:
2 oz Dark Jamaican Rum
2 oz Light Rum
1 oz Passion Fruit Syrup
1 oz Fresh Lime Juice
2 oz Pineapple Juice
1/2 oz Simple Syrup
Instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into hurricane glass with crushed ice.
